Package com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.query

Interface IPortfolioQueryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PortfolioQueryService
public interface IPortfolioQueryService
Contains functionalities for quering portfolio informations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Optional<ViewAppVersionAnnotationsDto> getAppVersionAnnotation​(java.lang.Long id, AppType type, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Gets the annotations by the specified application version and enterprise
    java.util.Optional<PortfolioQueryDto> getPortfolio​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Gets a portfolio by the portfolio id and the enterprise name
    java.util.Optional<ViewPortfolioClassDto> getPortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Gets the portfolio class by a given portfolio id, portfolio class id and enterprise
    java.util.Optional<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto> getPortfolioClassSubtree​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Gets the portfolio class sub structure for given the portfolio id, portfolio class id and the enterprise name

    Gets all portfolios for the given enterprise.

  • Method Details

    • getPortfolios

      java.util.List<PortfolioQueryDto> getPortfolios​(java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets all portfolios for the given enterprise.
      Parameters:
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the found portfolios

    • getPortfolio

      java.util.Optional<PortfolioQueryDto> getPortfolio​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets a portfolio by the portfolio id and the enterprise name
      Parameters:
      id - the portfolio id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the found portfolio; an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getPortfolioStructure

      java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto>> getPortfolioStructure​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets the portfolio structure for given the portfolio id and the enterprise name

      Structure:

       Portfolio 1
    |
    |----Portfolio class 1
    |            |
    |            |----Portfolio class 1.1
    |            |             |
    |            |             |----Portfolio class 1.1.1
    |            |
    |            |----Portfolio class 1.2
    |
    |----Portfolio class 2
                 |
                 |----Portfolio class 2.1
      Parameters:
      id - the portfolio id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the portfolio structure, if the portfolio exists; an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getPortfolioClass

      java.util.Optional<ViewPortfolioClassDto> getPortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets the portfolio class by a given portfolio id, portfolio class id and enterprise
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the found portfolio class; an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getPortfolioClassSubtree

      java.util.Optional<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto> getPortfolioClassSubtree​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets the portfolio class sub structure for given the portfolio id, portfolio class id and the enterprise name

      Structure:

       Portfolio class 1
      |
      |----Portfolio class 1.1
      |             |
      |             |----Portfolio class 1.1.1
      |
      |----Portfolio class 1.2
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the portfolio class subtree structure, if the portfolio class exists; an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getAppVersionAnnotation

      java.util.Optional<ViewAppVersionAnnotationsDto> getAppVersionAnnotation​(java.lang.Long id, AppType type, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Gets the annotations by the specified application version and enterprise
      Parameters:
      id - the application version id
      type - the application type
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the found annotations
